product_name: CamelBak Fourteener Hydration Pack - 100 fl. oz. - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Compact yet chock-full of technical features, the CamelBak Fourteener Hydration Pack with 100 fl. oz reservoir takes you peak bagging and other done-in-a-day adventures. 23-liter daypack is made from rugged, polyurethane-coated nylon for long-lasting wear. Included 100 fl. oz. Antidote(TM) reservoir features a center baffle to reduce slosh and a low-profile shape for stability. Quick Link(TM) system features patented Big Bite(TM) Valve, HydroGuard(TM) technology, PureFlow(TM) tube and an easy-to-clean wide-mouth opening. Folding arms lock into position to hold the reservoir open when drying; arms tuck out of the way around the port when not in use. Wide-mouth port cuts weight and makes it easy to fill and clean the reservoir; quick-snap cap tightens in just a quarter turn. Organizer pocket keeps your hiking essentials handy; stretchy quick-stash front pocket stows a helmet, rain jacket, etc. Other features include 4-point compression straps, a fleece-lined media/sunglasses pocket, stretch side pockets and tool attachments for trekking poles or an ice axe. Back panel has channeled EVA injected foam pods for multi-directional ventilation; covered with high-abrasion-resistant mesh. CamelBak Fourteener Hydration Pack with 100 fl. oz reservoir has a sternum strap for stabililty and a load-bearing belt. Closeout.
short_description: Compact yet chock-full of technical features, the CamelBak Fourteener Hydration Pack with 100 fl. oz reservoir takes you peak bagging and other done-in-a-day adventures.
